channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole around manhole cover, outside 99 Ryeworth Rd, 29th April
item.description:
Pothole around manhole cover, outside 99 Ryeworth Rd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Ryeworth Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 29th April
item.description:
Customer has called and would like to report Ringway barriers (half a dozen of them) they were placed there for STW works and this has now finished but these barriers remain serving no purpose. Please can these be collected if they are no longer required. They mentioned they are nothing to do with the wall collapsing.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 29th April
item.description:
Potholes
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 29th April
item.description:
Please pass to arbs team for further investigation. Tree growing on footway is leaning at approx 45 degrees and is causing an obstruction to the footway. Tree appears to be showing signs of poor health (see photos). Please investigate further and determine if Tree requires removal.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unauthorised cones placed in parking lay-by, 29th April
item.description:
Parking lay by outside houses 9 and 10 pine bank have obstructed the parking lay-by with their own cones which under the section 137 highways act is an offence as has been placed there without permission.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13,14, Pine Bank, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Incorrect new road markings, 29th April
item.description:
Outside 49 London Road, the new road markings after resurfacing work appeared overnight now cover our front driveway so we will not be able to access or leave our property should anyone park there. This is not how it was before the resurfacing work

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, London Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues
